title.en: Sunao ja Nai no wa Heart no Sei

altTitles.ja: 素直じゃないのはハートのせい

altTitles.ja-ro: Sunao ja Nai no wa Haato no Sei

altTitles.en: It's My Heart’s Fault That I'm Not Honest

description.en:
Akina has a fiancé named Sousuke, and their engagement was initially arranged by both of their parents, but the engagement was broken off. Akina, who has always had a strong and independent spirit, joined a company through her own merit and worked there energetically. 

However, her company merges with another company where Sousuke is working as an executive! Though he may be a little prickly, he is also obviously in love with Akina?!

A love story between a headstrong girl and a tsundere boy begins!
description.ja:
要するにこの2人、最強お惚気プレイ。

かつて親同士が決めた婚約者・宗佑と、婚約破談になった明奈。元々自立心が強かった明奈は、自分の力で入社しイキイキと働いていた。

けれど、会社が吸収合併された先で、宗佑が役員として働いていた！　しかも彼は、ツンツンしながらも明奈に好意丸出しで…！？

強がり女子×ツンデレ男子のすれ違いラブ開幕！

biography.en:
Favourites: L'arc~en~ciel, red, work, communication (telephone, mail, fax)
Dislikes: Extremely cold places, spiders, thunderstorms.

After 10 years working in Sho-Comi, in 2008 ending announced that she would leave it and continue drawing manga for adult women in Petit Comic.
